Home » 31Dht Dhātukathāpāḷi » 2 Niddesa » 2.10 Dasamanaya Vippayuttenavippayuttapadaniddesa » 2.10.2 Duka
2.10.2.1 Hetugocchaka
Niddesa
Dasamanaya Vippayuttenavippayuttapadaniddesa
Duka
Hetugocchaka
389.
479Hetūhi dhammehi ye dhammā…  sahetukehi dhammehi ye dhammā…  hetusampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā…  hetūhi ceva sahetukehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā…  sahetukehi ceva na ca hetūhi dhammehi ye dhammā…  hetūhi ceva hetusampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā…  hetusampayuttehi ceva na ca hetūhi dhammehi ye dhammā…  na hetusahetukehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā…  te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā; ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici vippayuttā.
<< 2.10.2 Dukaup2.10.2.2 Cūḷantaraduka >>
